sentences.en: a terrible storm
sentences.cn: 猛烈的暴风雨

sentences.en: Are you all right? You look terrible. Are you sick?
sentences.cn: 你没事儿吧？你的脸色很难看，生病了吗？

sentences.en: He had a terrible temper, and sometimes he would completely lose control.
sentences.cn: 他的脾气很坏，有时会完全失控。

sentences.en: He must be made answerable for these terrible crimes.
sentences.cn: 他必须对这些可恶的罪行负责。

sentences.en: He must be made to answer for his terrible crimes.
sentences.cn: 他必须为他的严重罪行付出代价。

sentences.en: He was a terrible complainer — always moaning about something.
sentences.cn: 他特别爱发牢骚，老是抱怨这抱怨那。

sentences.en: He was then overcome by a terrible fit of coughing.
sentences.cn: 接着他便控制不住地剧烈咳嗽了一阵。

sentences.en: He's got a terrible disease and will not live long.
sentences.cn: 他已身患重疾，时日无多。

sentences.en: I can state quite definitely it will be terrible.
sentences.cn: 我可以非常明确地说，情况会十分糟糕。

sentences.en: I had a terrible head and was extraordinarily drunk.
sentences.cn: 我头很痛，已经酩酊大醉。

sentences.en: I’d better write this down; I have a terrible memory.
sentences.cn: 我最好把它记下来，我的记性很差。

sentences.en: It was so humiliating, a terrible blow to my self-esteem.
sentences.cn: 这件事如此丢脸，深深地挫伤了我的自尊心。

sentences.en: Most modern housing estates are terrible and inevitably done on the cheap.
sentences.cn: 现在的房子大多质量差劲透顶，肯定都是偷工减料盖起来的。

sentences.en: Our firm has taken a terrible beating in recent years.
sentences.cn: 我们公司近几年败得一塌糊涂。

sentences.en: She wept when she heard the terrible news.
sentences.cn: 她听说这个噩耗后痛哭流涕。

sentences.en: The captain decided to withhold the terrible news even from his officers.
sentences.cn: 船长决定哪怕是对高级船员也要封锁这个可怕的消息。

sentences.en: The evening show was terrible, with hesitant unsure performances from all.
sentences.cn: 晚上的演出很糟，所有人都缩手缩脚，显得很不自信。

sentences.en: The hotel was absolutely terrible.
sentences.cn: 这家宾馆糟糕透了。

sentences.en: Their son had been injured in a terrible accident.
sentences.cn: 他们的儿子在一次严重事故中受过伤。

sentences.en: There developed a practice that came to a tragic and terrible end.
sentences.cn: 逐渐形成了一种做法，其结局却很悲惨。

sentences.en: There was a terrible noise and the roof caved in.
sentences.cn: 随着一阵可怕的响声，房顶坍塌了。

sentences.en: We’re worried that something terrible might have happened to Greg.
sentences.cn: 我们担心格雷格有可能遇到了什么可怕的事情。

sentences.en: You’re making a terrible mistake.
sentences.cn: 你犯了一个极大的错误。

words.tran_cn: 极好的；极其的，非常的；可怕的

trans.tran_cn: 非常严重的，可怕的，(感觉或看起来)病得很重的，劣质的，很糟糕的，十足的
